meanings.definition: The quality or state of being cooperative.
meanings.sent1: Her cooperativenesses in the group project helped everyone succeed.
meanings.sent2: The team's success was due to their cooperativenesses during the game.
meanings.sent3: The cooperativenesses of the animals in the zoo made feeding time a breeze.
meanings.sent4: The garden flourished thanks to the cooperativenesses of the different plants.
meanings.sent5: The village's prosperity was a result of the strong cooperativenesses among its residents.

meanings.definition: The act of working together towards a common goal.
meanings.sent1: Cooperativenesses among the students led to a fantastic science project.
meanings.sent2: The cooperativenesses of the team members ensured the project's success.
meanings.sent3: The cooperativenesses of the chefs in the kitchen created a delicious meal.
meanings.sent4: The cooperativenesses of the ants in building their nest was truly impressive.
meanings.sent5: The cooperativenesses of the bees in the hive kept everything running smoothly.

meanings.definition: The willingness to collaborate with others.
meanings.sent1: Her cooperativenesses shone through when she volunteered to help her classmates.
meanings.sent2: The success of the event was a result of everyone's cooperativenesses.
meanings.sent3: The cooperativenesses of the children in the playground game made it more fun.
meanings.sent4: The cooperativenesses of the team members made the project completion faster.
meanings.sent5: The cooperativenesses of the neighbors made the community a great place to live.
